name: Natural Emotion #2
description:
Start from the history of Mooi Indie (indies beautiful), which is just seen as the exotic romance of the Indies (Indonesia) land for the European community, making mooi indie paintings just seen as entertainment.
Mooi Indie painting is an expression of a form of manifestation to freeze nature in an idealistic way. This is the reason why I like the idea of mooi indie, "painting as entertainment," where in this current era is entertainment for our souls as human beings who are increasingly being eroded by busyness and ambition.
The more the times are growing, the more social distortions that occur between technology and society.
The desired natural landscape is increasingly hard to find because
eroded by new things and technology, so this triggers me to look for the longing of nature through the internet channeled through a screen.
This makes new thing to enjoying a landscape that we can call an unreal landscape. 
Natural emotion is a project to interpret the feelings I try to route with an image of panorama, where all the deepest feelings are hard to express our condition.
It's a form of emotional overflow, which cannot be captured by consciousness. Each individual has deep feelings about their feelings.
